definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
Qiongzhou Strait (between Hainan Island and mainland China)

pinyin: Huo4 er3 mu4 zi1 Hai3 xia2

definition: Bashi Channel in the northern part of the Luzon Strait, just south of Taiwan
the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)

pinyin: Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2

definition: Korea Strait/Tsushima Strait (between Japan and Korea)

pinyin: Da2 da2 ni2 er3 Hai3 xia2

definition: Luzon Strait between Taiwan and Luzon Island (Philippines)
Øresund/The Sound (strait between Denmark and Sweden)

pinyin: Bu4 li3 si1 tuo1 er3 Hai3 xia2

definition: Strait of Calais in the English channel/Strait of Dover/Pas-de-Calais, département of France
Strait of Messina between Calabria and Sicily

sentences.english: We took a hovercraft across the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘气垫船横渡英吉利海峡。

sentences.english: In Pas-de-Calais the French lifestyle is better.
sentences.chinese: 加莱海峡省的法式生活才更逍遥。

sentences.english: The Straits of Gibraltar are the strategic passage between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 直布罗陀海峡是地中海通向大西洋的咽喉。

sentences.english: Eg: She failed in her attempt to swim the tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 她横度英吉利海峡的尝试失败了。

sentences.english: We believe that it is up to the people on both sides of the Strait to resolve their differences peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为要由海峡两岸人民和平解决他们的分歧。

sentences.english: Dawn clouds frame the East Lamma Channel and Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 时值破晓，东博寮海峡和香港岛上浮云飘荡。

sentences.english: During the English Civil War the Channel Isle of Jersey remained loyal to the Crown and gave sanctuary to the King.
sentences.chinese: 在英国内战海峡泽西岛仍忠于官方和庇护了国王。

sentences.english: Offices will open across the Straits.
sentences.chinese: 海峡两岸将互设办事机构。

sentences.english: I must abandon vessel after piracy in the west mouth of Malacca Strait.
sentences.chinese: 我船在马六甲海峡西出口被海盗抢劫后必须弃船。

sentences.english: You've got to be able to defend in the China-Taiwan Strait.
sentences.chinese: 你还必须要能够保卫台湾海峡。

sentences.english: “Yeah, like a beacon in a fog-bound channel, ” I said.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，像在云遮雾罩的海峡中看见灯塔。

sentences.english: Fixed a bug allowing users to appear in a channel twice.
sentences.chinese: 固定在允许用户出现两次于海峡的故障。

sentences.english: They bored a tunnel under the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 他们在英吉利海峡下面开凿了隧道。

sentences.english: The city is connected with Singapore by a causeway across the narrow Johore Strait. Population, 249,880.
sentences.chinese: 有堤道穿过狭窄的柔佛海峡将其与新加坡相连。

sentences.english: In 2001, China held the Strait three exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 2001年，举办中国海峡两岸三地画展。

sentences.english: The strong current occurs near the Korea Strait.
sentences.chinese: 强流区在朝鲜海峡附近。

definition: opposite bank (of a body of water)

pinyin: Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2

definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
